details.description: Contact information for finding out about health and safety at work issues and making a complaint and reporting injuries
details.body:
Find information and advice about work-related health, safety and illness from the independent regulator, HSE.

Health and Safety Executive
www.hse.gov.uk


Health and Safety Executive
Redgrave Court
Merton Road
Bootle
Merseyside L20 7HS

If you need to report an incident or have a complaint about a health and safety matter in the workplace contact HSE for help and guidance on how to do this.

If you have an enquiry in Northern Ireland you should contact the Health and Safety Executive for Northern Ireland.
details.alternative_title: Contact the Health and Safety Executive

details.description: Accidents, health and safety law and workplace conditions

related.title: Health and safety for school children

details.description: Schools are responsible for your child's safety while they're at school or on a school trip. Find out what should be done to look after your child.
